Topic.Title: Going west moves player dot on map northwest and broken

Posts.EditableText: Hello so If i go east it brings me to the room just fine but if i go west to return  to the hallway the dot on the map we can see goes northwest and doesn't go back to the hallway visually, only text.... Im thinking of disabling the map but i don't want to give up much help appreciated!
Posts.HTML: Hello so If i go east it brings me to the room just fine but if i go west to return to the hallway the dot on the map we can see goes northwest and doesn't go back to the hallway visually, only text.... Im thinking of disabling the map but i don't want to give up much help appreciated!

Posts.EditableText: Fixed it it was because i mistakenly put the map inside the other map object lol
